author: horwat
msg: Initial import of implemenation that uses the JAXP 1.3 APIs. Created Branch for implementation so that it can be tested without affecting main trunk. This implementation includes:
- XPath NamespaceContext now used for namespace context processing (prefix resolution)
- XPath VariableResolver provides access to XPath Variables
- XPathUtil refactored to use the JAXP 1.3 API's
- see if Xalan XPath expression evaluation can be refactored
- a JAXP 1.3 implemenation is available in JDK 1.5
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: horwat
msg: In JstlUriResolver when external entitities are resolved the 'base' varies from different Xalan implementations. Fixed how base is handled to avoid problems with newer versions of Xalan like the one in JDK 5.0.
